items.title: Shaquille O’Neal must pay $1.8 million to end a years-long class action lawsuit after FTX investors accused him of duping them
items.description: Shaquille O'Neal, and other celebrities like Tom Brady and Stephen Curry, were named in the lawsuit in 2022.

items.title: Zoom’s CEO says work-life balance doesn’t exist: ‘work is life, life is work’ — but there’s one exception

items.title: One lone passenger survived the deadly Air India crash that killed more than 240: ‘He was disoriented with multiple injuries’
items.description: One passenger who was thrown from the plane survived.

items.title: Ford CEO says rare earth supply is ‘day to day’ after plant halt
items.description: “It’s day to day,” Ford Chief Executive Officer Jim Farley said.
